column8: The process of evaluating the quality, performance, or impact of a substance, product, or process.
An assessment of the safety and sustainability of chemicals and materials across their life cycle. May include hazard, safety, environmental, and functionality assessments.
An assessment that is focused on a specific aspect or dimension of safety and sustainability, such as functionality, safety, or environmental impact.
The superclass of all SSbD Assessments within the dimenstion functionality.
Assessment of mechanical properties of chemicals and materials.
Assessment of thermal properties of chemicals and materials.
Assessment of physical properties of chemicals and materials.
Assessment of Young's modulus of materials.
Assessment of bulk modulus of materials.
Assessment of Poisson's ratio of materials.
Assessment of glass transition temperature of materials.
Assessment of density of chemicals and materials.
The superclass of all dimensions relevant for SSbD assessments.
The dimension of functionality in the context of SSbD assessments.
The dimension of safety in the context of SSbD assessments.
The dimension of environmental impact in the context of SSbD assessments.
The dimension of social impact in the context of SSbD assessments.
The dimension of economic impact in the context of SSbD assessments.
